alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 14 at 10:32AM PDT until further notice by NWS Elko
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Humboldt River At Battle Mountain affecting Lander County. Bruneau River At Rowland affecting Elko County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the Lower Humboldt...including Battle Mountain...elevated river levels are forecast. For the Bruneau River...including Rowland...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Bruneau River At Rowland. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor flooding of Forest Service roads. Recreational use becomes limited. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:25 AM PDT Sunday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
